CustomField.description: This field is automatically set by SF flow when the Ready for Finalizing Stage field is changed. We need to trigger a flow when the Ready for Finalizing Stage field changes, but if the field becomes true because of a change on the quote, the flow is not triggered, so, this field will be used to find out when this change happened.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically set by SF flow when the Ready for Finalizing Stage field is changed. We need to trigger a flow when the Ready for Finalizing Stage field changes, but if the field becomes true because of a change on the quote, the flow is not triggered, so, this field will be used to find out when this change happened.
CustomField.label: Internal Ready for Finalizing Stage
